projects.title: CalsiCalculator
projects.description: The Calsi Calculator is a sophisticated web application designed to perform basic and advanced arithmetic calculations within an intuitive and user-friendly interface. Leveraging the power of ReactJS, this calculator provides a seamless and dynamic user experience, ensuring precision and efficiency in mathematical operations.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.description: Tic-Tac-Toe Too is more than just a game, it's a testament to the timeless appeal of classic games in the digital age. The project showcases the integration of front-end technologies to create an interactive and visually appealing gaming experience for players of all ages.

projects.title: dream2success
projects.description: Spearheaded the development of an automated HR department system, focusing on user-friendly interfaces and robust functionalities. Designed and implemented both User and Admin Dashboard Panels, ensuring an intuitive and efficient user experience. Played a key role in establishing the server infrastructure, implementing security protocols, and incorporating essential login-logout features. Contributed significantly to database connectivity, enhancing the system's ability to manage HR-related data effectively.

projects.title: ToDo List
projects.description: This Todo List website allows users to add tasks, delete individual tasks, remove all tasks, and remove selected tasks, providing a user-friendly and functional task management interface.
